ygData.subject: RE: more sylly questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I have run into cases where I have chained something then a SK in the group will attempt to cast a Darkness line spell and get the this spell can not take
ygData.messageBody:
I have run into cases where I have chained something then a SK in the group
will attempt to cast a Darkness line spell and get the "this spell can not
take hold" message. This may have been fixed in a recent patch though. As
far as the Snare/Root/Chain interaction goes if a mob is Snared/Rooted then
you chain it they mob will be free of Snare/Root after your chain wears off.

Rokenn

>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] more sylly questions
>Date: Wed, 10 Nov 1999 09:16:45 -1000
>
>Can you give more clarification on what you mean here? Did you intend to
>say
>Chain breaks root versus snare? Also, what do you mean by breaking
>darkness
>line DOTs. Never heard that one mentioned before.
>
>Thanks
>Galtin of E'ci
>
>
> > Some of this are what I would consider common game knowledge (ie invis
> > killing pets, Bellow breaking mesmerize since it is an attack). I did
> > mention the snare breaks root, but should have mentioned that it can
>kill
> > darkness line DoT's.
> >
